message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,200,000. This is a fair price considering the value it holds for you. Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,100,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I value our negotiation, $1,100,000 is still a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $1,150,000. This would be a good deal for both of us, and allows for a smooth transaction. Let me know what you think.

I understand your position, Alice. I've carefully considered your latest offer and am willing to move forward with a counteroffer of $1,125,000. This amount reflects the value I see in the product while also staying within my budget constraints. I hope this proposal will be acceptable to you.
